Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component

Class Orientation

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.core.component.Orientation
All Implemented Interfaces:
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
public final class Orientation extends Object implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.entity.Component
Facing of an entity in space. May optionally be relative to a parent orientation.

    Orientation(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 value)
    Constructs a new orientation with initial value.

  • Constructor Details

    • Orientation

      public Orientation(dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 value)
      Constructs a new orientation with initial value.

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 getValue()
      Returns the unit vector representing where this component faces relative to its parent orientation. If this component has no parent, this is the same as getGlobalValue().

    • getGlobalValue

      public dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Vector3 getGlobalValue()
      Returns the unit vector representing where this component faces in global space. If this component has no parent, this is the same as getValue().

    • getParent

      public Orientation getParent()
      Returns the parent orientation, if any.

    • setParent

      public void setParent(Orientation parent)
      Sets the parent orientation to parent. Setting to null makes this a root orientation.
